name: Grangers Wash + Repel Down 2 in 1
description:
After a long season of keeping you warm and cozy, your down sleeping bag and jacket need some TLC. This wash-in formula delivers effective cleaning, and restores durable water-repellency, in a single wash and dry cycle.Cleans all down and synthetic down articles, including gear with GORE-TEX® and eVent® linings.Restores water-repellent finishes.Heat activated in 30°C water and a low temperature tumble drier.

        Sustainability






.bluesign-cls-1,.bluesign-cls-2,.bluesign-cls-3{fill:none;}.bluesign-cls-2,.bluesign-cls-3{stroke:#333;stroke-width:1.79px;}.bluesign-cls-2{stroke-linejoin:round;}.bluesign-cls-3{stroke-miterlimit:10;}
